title: Excel Template
text: Two background colors used headers: Blue: data found corresponding Excel sheet filled project snapshots, observed datasets /qualification plan information Yellow: data found fill corresponding sheet

title: Excel Template
text: Green: project observed dataset present current qualification plan assumed Added qualification Grey: project observed dataset present current qualification plan andeither present list added snapshots/observed datasetor present version/path qualification plan Yellow: project observed dataset present current qualification plan present list added snapshots/observed datasetwhile version/path Changed

text: List project identifiers (Id) paths. background use color convention defined . Excel sheet edited.

title: Excel Template
text: List Building Blocks potential inheritance. Fill Parent-Project column project inherit corresponding building block parent project. Excel data validation set select available projects.

title: Excel Template
text: List Simulated Parameters potential inheritance. Fill Parent Project, Parent Simulation, Path Target Simulation columns project inherit corresponding simulated parameters parent project. Excel data validations set select available projects simulations.

title: Excel Template
text: List plots evaluations project simulation. Fill Section Reference column include evaluation corresponding section. Excel data validations set select available sections.

title: Excel Template

title: Excel Template
text: Define list Qualification Report sections. Fill Section Reference tag identify section. section sub-section, fill Parent Section column, Excel data validations set select available sections.

title: Excel Template

title: Get Started
text: create update qualification plan, workflow : Define list project snapshots /observed datasets Define Qualification Plan Convert Excel Edit Qualification Plan Excel Convert back Qualification Plan json format Run updated Qualification

title: Get Started
text: Steps 1 2 usually involve use latest release version project snapshots, observed data qualification plans. can done using function getLatestReleasedPaths() illustrated :
code: # Get latest released paths from a qualification plan latestPaths <- getLatestReleasedPaths(   qualificationPlan = "path/to/qualification_plan.json",   includePreReleases = FALSE,   returnUpdatedOnly = TRUE )  # Access the updated project and observed data paths latestProjectPaths <- latestPaths$projects latestObservedDataPaths <- latestPaths$observedData  # You can also ignore specific projects or observed data latestPaths <- getLatestReleasedPaths(   qualificationPlan = "path/to/qualification_plan.json",   projectsToIgnore = c("ProjectA", "ProjectB"),   observedDataToIgnore = c("ObsData1") )  # Get all paths (not just updated ones) allPaths <- getLatestReleasedPaths(   qualificationPlan = "path/to/qualification_plan.json",   returnUpdatedOnly = FALSE )

title: Get Started
text: article Excel Template describes content Excel template file, color data validation conventions edit converting back json format.

title: Get Started
text: basic example generic names showing include updated project snapshot qualification plan: detailed examples, can read following articles: Update Qualification Plan Evaluations Add Snapshot Qualification Plan Snapshot without Qualification Plan
code: ## Load the ospsuite.qualificationplaneditor package library(ospsuite.qualificationplaneditor) ospPath <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Open-Systems-Pharmacology" excelQualification <- "Updated-Qualification.xlsx"  # List your updated snapshot projects snapshotPaths <- list(   "Compound A" = file.path(ospPath, "A-Model/vX.X/A-Model.json"),   "Compound B" = file.path(ospPath, "B-Model/vX.X/B-Model.json"),   "A-B-DDI" = file.path(ospPath, "A-B-DDI/vX.X/A-B-DDI.json") )  # List your updated observed datasets observedDataPaths <- list("DDI Ratios" = list(     Path = file.path(ospPath, "Database-for-observed-data/vX.X/DDI.csv"),     Type = "DDIRatio"     ))  # Initial qualification plan qualificationPlan <- file.path(ospPath, "A-Model/vY.Y/Qualification/qualification_plan.json")  # qualification plan converted to Excel toExcelEditor(   fileName = excelQualification,   snapshotPaths = snapshotPaths,    observedDataPaths = observedDataPaths,   qualificationPlan = qualificationPlan )  # Tip: this will open Excel (or Libre office) with the created Excel workbook utils::browseURL(excelQualification)

title: Convert Qualification Plan From/To Excel
text: can install development version ospsuite.qualificationplaneditor like :

title: Convert Qualification Plan From/To Excel
text: basic example showing include updated project snapshot qualification plan:
code: ## Load the ospsuite.qualificationplaneditor package library(ospsuite.qualificationplaneditor) ospPath <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Open-Systems-Pharmacology" excelQualification <- "Updated-Qualification.xlsx"  # List your updated snapshot projects snapshotPaths <- list(   "Compound A" = file.path(ospPath, "A-Model/vX.X/A-Model.json"),   "Compound B" = file.path(ospPath, "B-Model/vX.X/B-Model.json"),   "A-B-DDI" = file.path(ospPath, "A-B-DDI/vX.X/A-B-DDI.json") )  # List your updated observed datasets observedDataPaths <- list("DDI Ratios" = list(     Path = file.path(ospPath, "Database-for-observed-data/vX.X/DDI.csv"),     Type = "DDIRatio"     ))  # Initial qualification plan qualificationPlan <- file.path(ospPath, "A-Model/vY.Y/Qualification/qualification_plan.json")  # qualification plan converted to Excel excelUI(   fileName = excelQualification,   snapshotPaths = snapshotPaths,    observedDataPaths = observedDataPaths,   qualificationPlan = qualificationPlan )  # Tip: this will open Excel (or Libre office) with the created Excel workbook utils::browseURL(excelQualification)
